bilateral internal nasal valve collapse.context: Findings: There is also evidence of bilateral internal as well as external nasal valve collapse.

bilateral external nasal valve collapse.context: Findings: There is also evidence of bilateral internal as well as external nasal valve collapse.

repair of internal nasal valve collapse.context: Procedures: 2. Repair of internal nasal valve collapse using auricular cartilage.

repair of bilateral external nasal valve.context: Procedures: 3. Repair of bilateral external nasal valve collapse using auricular cartilage.

harvest of right auricular cartilage.context: Procedures: 4. Harvest of right auricular cartilage.

iv fluids.context: Iv Fluids: Include a liter of crystalloid fluid.

significantly deviated septum.context: Findings: Include that of significantly deviated septum with postoperative changes and a significant septal spur along the floor.

septal spur.context: Description Of The Procedure In Detail: A hemitransfixion incision was made on the left revealing a large septal spur consisting primarily down on the floor of the left nostril creating nearly a picture of the vestibular stenosis on the side.

upper airway resistance.context: Indications: The patient is a pleasant 49-year-old gentleman who had undergone a previous septorhinoplasty after significant trauma in his 20s. He now presents with significant upper airway resistance and nasal obstruction and is unable to tolerate a CPAP machine.

nasal obstruction.context: Indications: The patient is a pleasant 49-year-old gentleman who had undergone a previous septorhinoplasty after significant trauma in his 20s. He now presents with significant upper airway resistance and nasal obstruction and is unable to tolerate a CPAP machine.

inability to tolerate CPAP machine.context: Indications: The patient is a pleasant 49-year-old gentleman who had undergone a previous septorhinoplasty after significant trauma in his 20s. He now presents with significant upper airway resistance and nasal obstruction and is unable to tolerate a CPAP machine.

significant trauma.context: Indications: The patient is a pleasant 49-year-old gentleman who had undergone a previous septorhinoplasty after significant trauma in his 20s.

Afrin-soaked pledgets.context: Description Of The Procedure In Detail: The nose was decongested using Afrin-soaked pledgets followed by the injection of % lidocaine with 1:100,000 epinephrine in the submucoperichondrial planes bilaterally.

lidocaine with 1:100,000 epinephrine.context: Description Of The Procedure In Detail: The nose was decongested using Afrin-soaked pledgets followed by the injection of % lidocaine with 1:100,000 epinephrine in the submucoperichondrial planes bilaterally.

hemitransfixion incision.context: Description Of The Procedure In Detail: A hemitransfixion incision was made on the left revealing a large septal spur consisting primarily down on the floor of the left nostril creating nearly a picture of the vestibular stenosis on the side.

vestibular stenosis.context: Description Of The Procedure In Detail: A hemitransfixion incision was made on the left revealing a large septal spur consisting primarily down on the floor of the left nostril creating nearly a picture of the vestibular stenosis on the side.

auricular cartilage.context: Description Of The Procedure In Detail: Therefore, attention was turned to harvesting the right-sided auricular cartilage, which was done after the region had adequately been prepped and draped in a sterile fashion.

bilateral spreader graft.context: Description Of The Procedure In Detail: The cartilage was removed. It was placed in saline, noted to be fashioned in the bilateral spreader graft and alar rim graft as well as a small piece of crush which was used to be placed along the top of the dorsal irregularity.

alar rim graft.context: Description Of The Procedure In Detail: The cartilage was removed. It was placed in saline, noted to be fashioned in the bilateral spreader graft and alar rim graft as well as a small piece of crush which was used to be placed along the top of the dorsal irregularity.

dorsal irregularity.context: Description Of The Procedure In Detail: The cartilage was removed. It was placed in saline, noted to be fashioned in the bilateral spreader graft and alar rim graft as well as a small piece of crush which was used to be placed along the top of the dorsal irregularity.

external septorhinoplasty approach.context: Description Of The Procedure In Detail: After an external septorhinoplasty approach had been performed and reflection of the skin and soft tissue envelope had been performed, adequately revealing straight septum with significant narrowing with what appeared to be detached perhaps from his ipsilateral cartilages rather from his previous surgery.

straight septum.context: Description Of The Procedure In Detail: After an external septorhinoplasty approach had been performed and reflection of the skin and soft tissue envelope had been performed, adequately revealing straight septum with significant narrowing with what appeared to be detached perhaps from his ipsilateral cartilages rather from his previous surgery.

alar rim grafts.context: Description Of The Procedure In Detail: Following this, attention was turned to placing the alar rim grafts where pockets were created along the caudal aspect of the lower lateral cartilage and just along the alar margin.

lower lateral cartilage.context: Description Of The Procedure In Detail: Following this, attention was turned to placing the alar rim grafts where pockets were created along the caudal aspect of the lower lateral cartilage and just along the alar margin.

inherent asymmetry.context: Description Of The Procedure In Detail: The lower lateral cartilage has had some inherent asymmetry.

endodermal suture.context: Description Of The Procedure In Detail: An endodermal suture was placed just to reenforce the region using a 5-0 PDS suture.

Doyle splints.context: Description Of The Procedure In Detail: Doyle splints were placed and secured down using a nylon suture.

nylon suture.context: Description Of The Procedure In Detail: Doyle splints were placed and secured down using a nylon suture.

ointment.context: Description Of The Procedure In Detail: They had ointment also placed on them.

nasopharynx suctioned.context: Description Of The Procedure In Detail: Following this, nasopharynx was suctioned.

external splint.context: Description Of The Procedure In Detail: Therefore, an external splint was placed after the application of Steri-Strips.
